event.description: Tikonov Accords signed, Oleg Tikonov assassinated, Second Soviet Civil War begins
Second Soviet Civil War ends
Terran Alliance formed
Kearny/Fuchida experiments validated
Deimos Project begun
TAS Pathfinder makes first manned survey of Tau Ceti IV
Research outpost established on New Earth
First permanent interstellar colony established on New Earth
Colonization Procedure Referendum passed
Alliance Grand Survey of Inhabited Planets conducted
Freedom declares itself independent, Outer Reaches Rebellion begins
Liberal Party displaces Expansionist Party
Outer Reaches Rebellion ends
Terran Alliance releases Demarcation Declaration
Rim Worlds Republic formed, Calderon Flotilla leaves Aix-La-Chappelle
Taurus colonized
Samantha Calderon dies, Timothy Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Free Worlds League formed
Hector Rowe commits suicide, Maxwell Rowe named First Consul of the Rim Worlds Republic
Megaris system settled
Samantha system settled
Terran Alliance collapses
Terran Hegemony formed
Renfield system settled
Federated Suns formed, Cyrton system settled
Draconis Combine formed
Ishtar system settled
Timothy Calderon dies, Sandra Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Richard Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds, Taurian Concordat formed
Lyran Commonwealth formed, Arabella Rowe named First Consul
Capellan Confederation formed
Arabella Rowe dies, Michael Durant named First Consul
Richard Calderon dies, Daniel Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Daniel Calderon dies, Sigur Fonn named Regent-Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Age of War begins
Ares Conventions signed
Julius Avellar withdraws to Alpheratz
Outworlds Alliance formed
Outworlds Alliance Charter ratified
BattleMech invented
First full-scale use of BattleMechs
Heather Durant dies, Terens Amaris named First Consul
Rim Worlds Republic becomes hereditary Amaris holding
Omsol Accords signed
Ariana's War takes place
Kotsandra Centrella founds the Magistracy of Canopus
Magistracy of Canopus' Constitution of Magistracy Free States established
Coranna Centrella named Magestrix
Star League formed
Star League Directive 21 instituted, Santiago Massacre
Malagrotta Affair, Rim Worlds Republic Universal Act of Loyalty passed
Pollux Proclamation issued, Rim Worlds Republic Manchester Directive issued, Reunification War begins
Case Amber adopted
Star League forces orbitally bombard Robsart, Consadine Mission launched, Operation Mailed Fist begins
Case Black enacted, Amalthea Kincaid assassinated
Peace of Cerberus negotiated
Grigori Avellar dies, Barton Avellar named Parliamentary President
Mitchell Calderon dies, Marantha Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds, Magistracy of Canopus is conquered, Melissa Humphreys appointed Military Governor of the Magistracy of Canopus
Taurian Concordat surrenders, Marantha Calderon commits suicide, Henry Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds, Rim Provisional Government surrenders
Gregory Amaris assassinated, Richard Amaris named President of the Rim Worlds Republic
Barton Avellar assassinated, Rodrigo Avellar named Parliamentary President
Home Rule reestablished in the Magistracy of Canopus, Rinalla Centrella named Magestrix
Last Star League occupation forces leave Taurian Concordat
Last Star League occupation forces leave Outworlds Alliance
Rinalla Centrella abdicates, Carla Centrella named Magestrix
Richard Amaris dies, Amanda Amaris named President
Amanda Amaris assassinated, Jeffrey Amaris named President
Democratic elections restored in the Rim Worlds Republic, Jeffrey Amaris abdicates, Selanta Amaris named President
Star League adopts universal currency
Rodrigo Avellar dies, Caryn Avellar named Parliamentary President
Henry Calderon abdicates, Consuelo Calderon named Regent-Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Caryn Avellar removed, Peter Avellar named Parliamentary President
Peter Avellar killed
Adolfo Avellar named Parliamentary President
Selanta Amaris undergoes cancer treatment, Tadeo Amaris named Regent
Council Edict of 2650 issued, Consuelo Calderon claims right of succession in Taurian Concordat
New taxes levied against territorial states
Carla Centrella abdicates, Celine Centrella named Magestrix
Celine Centrella dies, Gorraine Centrella named Magestrix
Consuelo Calderon named Second Lord
Consuelo Calderon dies, Reginald Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Taurian Concordat's Education Reform Act passed
Gorraine Centrella dies, Kim Centrella named Magestrix

Reginald Calderon retires, Jentarra Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds, Adolfo Avellar dies, Davis Avellar named Parliamentary President, Selanta Amaris dies, Carl Siever named President
Jentarra Calderon removed, Brandon Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Kim Centrella retires, Jehan Centrella named Magestrix
Davis Avellar retires, Heather Avellar named Regent of the Outworlds Alliance
Beatrice Avellar named Parliamentary President
Stefan Amaris born
Brandon Calderon retires, Hampton Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Hampton Calderon assassinated, Nicoletta Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Jehan Centrella retires, Vanura Centrella named Magestrix
Simon Cameron dies, Richard Cameron named First Lord of the Star League, Aleksandr Kerensky named Regent
Vanura Centrella dies, Janina Centrella named Magestrix
Richard Cameron comes of age, Executive Order 156 issued and withdrawn
Taxation Edict passed
New Vandenberg Crisis, Beatrice Avellar dies, Allyce Avellar named Parliamentary President
Amaris coup
Amaris-Kerensky Civil War begins, Rim Worlds Republic invaded
Rim Worlds Republic destroyed
Allyce Avellar removed, David Avellar named Parliamentary President
Stefan Amaris executed
Star League disbanded
First Succession War begins, Magistracy of Canopus' declaration of independence issued
Taurian-Canopian War begins
Taurian-Canopian War ends
First Succession War ends
Second Succession War begins
Ignatius Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Taurian Concordat's Constitutional Crisis of 2860
Second Succession War ends
Third Succession War begins
Some Canopian Elector's positions become hereditary
Eugenio Rosario killed
Tamara Centrella dies, Kyalla Centrella named Magestrix
Neil Avellar II named Parliamentary President
Thomas Calderon named Protector of the Taurian Homeworlds
Outworlds Alliance Educational Exchange Program begins
Third Succession War ends
Fourth Succession War begins
St. Ives Compact formed

Neil Avellar II marries Rebecca DeSanders, Free Rasalhague Republic formed
Kyalla Centrella removed, Emma Centrella named Magestrix
Clans invade the Periphery
Federated Commonwealth officially formed
Lyran Alliance formed
